r.d: Takes the PEAR documentation CVS and the PEAR package CVS directories, and compares which packages have been documented. Also checks which classes and methods have been documented, and generates HTML reports.
r.n: - Detect classes and methods via <classname> and <function> tags. - Some bugfixes - More test cases - Multiple classes per file detected - AllTests.php file for automatic unit tests - package.xml xpath problems solved
